thread.title: Lina D iSavino
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Lina D iSavino

author: Lina D iSavino
title: Lina D iSavino
text: I am extremely pleased with Skipper! It was so easy to use and beyond helpful! I was very worried about what I would do to secure room blocks for my guest and this website made it a breeze!!!! I recommend this website to EVERYONE PLANNING A WEDDING OR EVENT THAT REQUIRES A HOTEL BLOCK!!! Hands down the best site I have used so far
